backend/main.mo: Actor implementing contact form submission with rate limiting, admin‑gated retrieval, and AccessControl integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a visual theme update and listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying global background and text utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for Home, Services, About, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/about/Differenti: Grid component rendering differentiator items with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Validated contact form handling input, client‑side errors, submission, and success or error feedback states.
frontend/src/components/contact/Submissi: Alert component showing success or detailed error messages with reset handling and rate‑limit detection.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Service card displaying icon, details, included items, outcomes, and a consultation CTA.
frontend/src/components/site/CalloutCard: Reusable callout card with optional icon, description, and content slot.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, navigation links, contact text, and attribution section.
frontend/src/components/site/Hero.tsx: Renders a hero section with headline, subheadline, optional background image, and children content.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Provides a layout section with variant and size styling options wrapping children in a container.
Defines the overall site layout including top navigation, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/TopNav.tsx: Implements a responsive navigation bar with desktop links, mobile sheet menu, and routing actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the document title and meta description when pages mount and restores defaults on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Defines a mutation to submit contact forms through the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query and identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with metadata, company story sections, and differentiator content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with metadata, contact form, contact details, and expectations information.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero messaging, procurement-focused sections, and navigation-driven CTAs using predefined content arrays.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays structured service offerings with icons, descriptions, features, and outcomes, along with page metadata setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session-stored values for routing and state retention.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, containers, shadows, and plugins for the site's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and current state for guiding development of the Joynexm website.
